#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem free camera.

=== Overview ===
The free camera is controlled by the user. The camera orientation is fixed by a yaw axis.
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFreeCameraMoveFactor(double camera_id, double units_per_sec) ===
----
Sets the amount of world units the camera is able to move per second.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _units_per_second_ - The number of units the camera can move per second.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFreeCameraRotationFactor(double camera_id, double factor) ===
----
Sets the factor amount for camera rotations.

The default rotation factor is 0.13.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _factor_ - The rotation factor.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !YawFreeCamera(double camera_id, double amount) ===
----
Yaws the camera by the specified amount.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !PitchFreeCamera(double camera_id, double amount) ===
----
Pitch the camera by the specified amount.
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraLeft(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera left by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraRight(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera right by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraForward(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera forward by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraBackward(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera backward by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraUp(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera up by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !MoveFreeCameraDown(double camera_id, double percentage) ===
----
Moves a camera down by the specified percentage. 
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
   * _percentage_ - Optional percentage to move the camera. Default is 1.0.
<BR>
<BR>
